text: Uye iri (Qur’aan) iBhuku rakaropafadzwa iro ratakadzikisa, richitsinhira (nhaurwa) dzakauya mushure maro, kuti muve munopa yambiro kuna Mai vemaguta (Makkah) uye neavo vakarikomberedza. Avo vanotenda muhupenyu hwemangwana, vanotenda mariri (Qur’aan), uye vanochengetedza minamato (Swalaah) yavo
